mapper.select: select b.boa_no, b.boa_name, u.usr_no as "userVO.usr_no", u.usr_id as "userVO.usr_id", u.usr_name as "userVO.usr_name" from t_board b inner join T_USER u on b.usr_no = u.usr_no where b.boa_status = 1 order by b.boa_name asc
mapper.insert: insert into t_board(boa_no, boa_name, usr_no) values(seq_board.nextval, #{boa_name}, #{userVO.usr_no})
insert into t_article(art_no, art_title, art_content, art_ip, boa_no, usr_no) values(seq_article.nextval, #{art_title}, #{art_content}, #{art_ip}, #{boa_no}, #{userVO.usr_no})
mapper.select: select b.boa_no, b.boa_name, u.usr_name as "userVO.usr_name", u.usr_id as "userVO.usr_id" from t_board b inner join t_user u on b.usr_no = u.usr_no where b.boa_no = #{boa_no}

select a.art_no, a.art_title, a.art_regdate, a.art_readcnt, u.usr_id as "userVO.usr_id", u.usr_name as "userVO.usr_name" from t_article a inner join t_user u on a.usr_no = u.usr_no where a.boa_no = #{boa_no} order by a.art_no desc

select a.art_no, a.art_title, a.art_content, a.art_like, a.art_dislike, a.art_regdate, a.art_readcnt, a.art_com_cnt, a.art_ip, a.boa_no, u.usr_no as "userVO.usr_no", u.usr_name as "userVO.usr_name", u.usr_id as "userVO.usr_id" from t_article a inner join t_user u on a.usr_no = u.usr_no where a.art_no = #{art_no}
mapper.update: update t_article set art_readcnt = art_readcnt + 1 where art_no = #{art_no}
mapper.delete: delete from t_article where art_no = #{art_no} and usr_no = #{userVO.usr_no}
mapper.update: update T_ARTICLE set art_title = #{art_title}, art_content = #{art_content} where art_no = #{art_no} and usr_no = #{userVO.usr_no}
